title: Angled Slab-Serif - Any ideas?
content:
Anyone familiar with this one? I've already tried WhatTheFont and Identifont - I presume it's from a smaller foundry.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013065459im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture-2_4487.jpg)
author: jimsbee

comments.content: looks like Emigres [Base Twelve Serif Regular](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013065459/http:/www.emigre.com/fontpage.php?PBaSeR.html), ALE set in _lowercase_ small caps.

Ya, I thought of that too - it looks about right, unfortunately I don't have the Small Caps version so I can't tell for sure.

Thanks.
